item.title: UFO sightings in Poland
item.description:
UFO Sightings in Poland 🔗

This article documents alleged UFO sightings in Poland. It includes specific incidents with dates, locations, and brief descriptions.

10 May 1978, Emilcin 🔗

This section focuses on the Emilcin Abduction, where a farmer in Emilcin claimed to have been abducted and examined by short, green-faced humanoid beings. The encounter allegedly took place inside a white, hovering craft. A memorial now stands at the site of the alleged abduction.

19 January 2009, Jarnołtówek 🔗

This section details a sighting in Jarnołtówek near Prudnik. Adam Maksymów reported seeing a large saucer with a triangular blue beam rising into the sky. The object was accompanied by loud noises and a buzzing sound. Other residents of Jarnołtówek also reported witnessing the same object.

See also 🔗

This section provides a link to the main “List of reported UFO sightings” article on Wikipedia, allowing readers to explore a broader range of UFO incidents worldwide.

References 🔗

This section lists the sources used to support the claims made in the article. These include news articles from Kraków Post, Nowa Trybuna Opolska, and Gazeta Krakowska. The references provide external verification and further reading on the reported sightings.

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UFO_sightings_in_Poland
